programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: A neighborhood of families rushes home for the holidays, ready to share in the chaos and joy of the season.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: While home for the holidays, Josh is sanctioned with community service by old high school connection Sheriff Nora after some driving infractions; on ornament duty, he bonds with Nora's son, Theo.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's gambling addiction worries Sophia; Blanche dates a co-worker.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: An FBI agent investigates the girls ahead of a possible visit from President Bush, which leads them to reminisce about their experiences together.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The girls continue to reminisce about their experiences together; an FBI agent announces that President Bush will be visiting their home; Dorothy readies a list of points to make to the president.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: After watching a focus group evaluate his show, Frasier obsesses about a newsstand owner who expressed a negative opinion.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier reflects on the years since his return to Seattle when he celebrates his third anniversary at the radio station.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van apply for food stamps; against her better judgement, Reba accepts working at her ex-husband's office.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba accepts a job reporting to Barbra Jean in Brock's dental office; Cheyenne goes to college; Van stays home to watch Elizabeth.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba tries to refrain from making fun of Barbra Jean during Jake's birthday party, but her plan backfires.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra is irked when Reba takes a romantic interest in her boyfriend's dad, creating a double-dating dilemma.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland
programme.desc: A working Chicago mom brings her kids with her on a business trip to Memphis so they can all visit Graceland during the week before Christmas. But she is thrown for a loop when she bumps into an old flame from her days as a singer in college.

programme.title: Navigating Christmas
programme.desc: Recently divorced Melanie and her son Jason visit a remote island for Christmas, only to find themselves running a real working lighthouse where she connects with the curt but cute owner.

programme.title: Christmas With a Kiss
programme.desc: A woman returns home to help with her family's Christmas Carnival, and romance ignites. A photo journalist curates a surprise reunion.

programme.title: My Grown-Up Christmas List
programme.desc: A journalist and a military man share a special bond that grows between them over the course of several Christmases they spend together and apart.

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A snowbound stranger (Warren Christie) brightens the holidays for a retired police officer (Henry Winkler) and his niece (Brooke Burns).

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: Christmas at Sea
programme.desc: Hallmark cruisers meet their favorite stars and enjoy a tree lighting at sea.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
programme.desc: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmastime when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's pregnant daughter, Rebecca, pales at the thought of childbirth.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose, who was adopted, meets her biological father while Sophia is in the hospital.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Stan interests Dorothy in re-establishing a relationship; Rose makes an ill-advised sale.

programme.desc: Dorothy tries to bring a reclusive aging hippie out of his shell.

programme.desc: When Reba takes a full-time job, Jake starts calling Barbra Jean "Mommy.".

programme.desc: Cheyenne convinces her mother to try speed-dating after Reba has a disastrous night on the town.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: Aria hopes being selected for Sterling Masters' Big Holiday Adventure will save Christmas in Midway. Little does she know that Alex Bartlett is the voice behind Sterling Masters.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two seemingly incompatible game designers in Chicago team up to create a romantic city-wide scavenger hunt to promote a hotel chain.

programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: A speech writer makes a deal with his ex-girlfriend to pretend they are a couple to save his family's Christmas. It's not long before both the ruse and their feelings catch up with them.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.
